languages.text: {n}Сестра битвы бодро демонстрирует, как правильно тянуть мышцы, делать наклоны и приседания, заставляя повторять упражнения по несколько заходов. Ее глаза горят праведным пламенем, а голос звонок и ясен — проводит зарядку она с тем же усердием, что разит еретиков.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
Игрок — встает
Стартует анимация (луп из 3 анимаций типа "руки в стороны", "поклон", "разогнулась")

Игрок — встает
Стартует анимация (луп из 3 анимаций типа "руки в стороны", "поклон", "разогнулась")

languages.text: {n}Argenta briskly explains how to stretch your muscles correctly. She makes you repeat each exercise multiple times as she teaches you the best way to do bends and squats. Her eyes are alight with righteous fire and her voice rings out with conviction — she shows the same dedication to completing each exercise as she does to destroying heretics.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сестра битвы бодро демонстрирует, как правильно тянуть мышцы, делать наклоны и приседания, заставляя повторять упражнения по несколько заходов. Ее глаза горят праведным пламенем, а голос звонок и ясен — проводит зарядку она с тем же усердием, что разит еретиков.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta briskly demonstrates how to stretch your muscles correctly, how to do bends and squats, making you repeat multiple sets of exercises. Her eyes are alight with righteous fire, and her voice is clear — she does her exercises with the same dedication as when she destroys heretics.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Argenta vous explique à vive allure comment vous étirer correctement. Elle vous fait répéter chaque exercice plusieurs fois en vous apprenant la meilleure manière de faire des flexions et extensions. Son regard est animé d'une détermination ardente qui s'entend même dans sa voix retentissante. Elle met autant de cœur à l'ouvrage que lorsqu'elle combat les hérétiques.{/n}

Her eyes are alight with righteous fire and her voice rings out with conviction — she shows the same dedication to completing each exercise as she does to destroying heretics.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Argenta explica brevemente cómo estirar los músculos correctamente. Te hace repetir cada ejercicio varias veces al tiempo que te muestra la mejor forma de realizar estiramientos laterales y sentadillas. Sus ojos chispean con el fuego de la justicia y su voz resuena con convicción: imprime la misma dedicación a cada ejercicio que a la destrucción de los herejes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta briskly explains how to stretch your muscles correctly. She makes you repeat each exercise multiple times as she teaches you the best way to do bends and squats. Her eyes are alight with righteous fire and her voice rings out with conviction — she shows the same dedication to completing each exercise as she does to destroying heretics.{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔兴致勃勃地向你解释如何正确地拉伸肌肉。每个动作她都让你重复很多次，同时告诉你伸展与深蹲的最佳姿势。她的目光中闪耀着正义的烈焰，声音中也充满了信念。她全心全意地协助你完成每个动作，热忱程度不亚于消灭异端分子。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta briskly explains how to stretch your muscles correctly. She makes you repeat each exercise multiple times as she teaches you the best way to do bends and squats. Her eyes are alight with righteous fire and her voice rings out with conviction — she shows the same dedication to completing each exercise as she does to destroying heretics.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔兴致勃勃地向你解释如何正确地拉伸肌肉。每个动作她都让你重复很多次，同时告诉你伸展与深蹲的最佳姿势。她的目光中闪耀着正义的烈焰，声音中也充满了信念。她全心全意地协助你完成每个动作，热忱程度不亚于消灭异端分子。{/n}

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは正しい筋肉のストレッチ方法を、明るく教えてくれた。彼女は屈伸やスクワットの方法を教えながらも、各トレーニングを何度も繰り返させた。彼女の目は正義の炎で輝き、彼女の声は信念に満ちている。まるで異端者を滅ぼすのと同じように、それぞれの練習をやり遂げることに献身的な姿勢を見せている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta briskly explains how to stretch your muscles correctly. She makes you repeat each exercise multiple times as she teaches you the best way to do bends and squats. Her eyes are alight with righteous fire and her voice rings out with conviction — she shows the same dedication to completing each exercise as she does to destroying heretics.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Argenta erklärt dir kurz und bündig, wie du deine Muskeln richtig dehnst. Sie lässt dich jede Übung mehrfach wiederholen und bringt dir bei, wie man am besten Kniebeugen und ähnliche Übungen ausführt. In ihren Augen brennt rechtschaffenes Feuer, in ihrer Stimme liegt die pure Überzeugung. Sie zeigt ebenso viel Hingabe beim Absolvieren dieser Übungen wie beim Auslöschen von Ketzern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta briskly explains how to stretch your muscles correctly. She makes you repeat each exercise multiple times as she teaches you the best way to do bends and squats. Her eyes are alight with righteous fire and her voice rings out with conviction — she shows the same dedication to completing each exercise as she does to destroying heretics.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Argenta, kaslarını nasıl doğru şekilde gereceğini canlı bir şekilde açıklıyor. Esneme ve çömelme hareketlerini yapmanın en doğru yolunu anlatırken sana her bir egzersizi birkaç kez tekrar ettiriyor. Gözleri dindar bir ateşle yanarken sesi de inançla yankılanıyor. Egzersizleri, kâfirleri yok ederken gösterdiği kararlılıkla sergiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta briskly explains how to stretch your muscles correctly. She makes you repeat each exercise multiple times as she teaches you the best way to do bends and squats.
